CheckTitle: Check Lambda Function URL CORS configuration.
Description: Check Lambda Function URL CORS configuration.
Risk: Publicly accessible services could expose sensitive data to bad actors.

Code.CLI: aws lambda update-function-url-config --region AWS_REGION --function-name FUNCTION-NAME --auth-type AWS_IAM --cors 'AllowOrigins=https://www.example.com,AllowMethods=*,ExposeHeaders=keep-alive,MaxAge=3600,AllowCredentials=false'

Recommendation.Text: Grant usage permission on a per-resource basis and applying least privilege principle.
